name: MLP: FiM Name Generator
description: Ever dreamt of galloping through Equestria with a name that truly *sparkles*? This generator will conjure up the most fabulous, friendship-filled names this side of Ponyville! Prepare for a mane-ificent transformation!
introduction: Welcome, everypony, to the ultimate MLP: Friendship is Magic name generator! Whether you're crafting a fanfic, creating a role-playing character, or just want to see what your pony persona would be, this tool is your ticket to a perfectly pony-fied identity. Get ready to discover your inner unicorn!
howToUse: Hold your horses! Just kidding, no horses needed. Simply click the 'Generate' button. Prepare to be amazed!
Not feeling the first result? No worries, we've got magic to spare! Click again for a fresh, dazzling name.
Found the perfect name? Fantastic! Now go forth and spread the magic of friendship throughout Equestria (or, you know, the internet).
Want to get even *more* creative? Play with the prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique pony name. The sky's the limit (or maybe just Cloudsdale)!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fanfiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are designed to inspire your creativity. Feel free to use them for your fanfics, role-playing games, or any other pony-related projects.

faqs.question: Are the generated names actually good?
faqs.answer: We think so! We've carefully curated prefixes and suffixes to create names that fit the MLP universe. But hey, beauty is in the eye of the beholder (or the flank of the pony)!

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a better writer?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee instant writing prowess, a great name can certainly inspire you! Consider it a sprinkle of creative fairy dust.

faqs.question: Is this generator endorsed by Hasbro?
faqs.answer: Nope! This is purely a fan-made creation, born out of our love for all things MLP. We're just spreading the friendship magic!

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the generator. The more, the mare-ier!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! With so many possible combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner pony. And remember, you can always mix and match!
